title: The far-right radical in Israel’s new government
description: Itamar Ben-Gvir has spent a lifetime on the fringes of Israeli politics. He was once considered so extreme that he wasn’t allowed to serve in the Israeli army. Now he is the country’s security minister. Bethan McKernan reports. Help support our independent journalism at theguardian.com/infocus
episode: The far-right radical in Israel’s new government
creator: The Guardian
